original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa🔽Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)🔽15.37. Saññojanadukādi, Kusalattika🔽Nosaññojanaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nosaññojano nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā🔽…pe… noganthaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nogantho nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa  dhamma anuloma paccanīya  saññojana duka ādi kusala ttika  no saññojanam kusalam dhammam paṭicca no saññojanaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā  pe nogantham kusalam dhammam paṭicca noganthaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: …pe… nooghaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noogho nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā🔽…pe… noyogaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noyogo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā🔽…pe… nonīvaraṇaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nonīvaraṇo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā🔽…pe… noparāmāsaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noparāmāso nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)🔽Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: pe no ogham kusalam dhammam paṭicca no oghaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā 🔽pe noyogam kusalam dhammam paṭicca noyogaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā 🔽pe no nīvaraṇam kusalam dhammam paṭicca no nīvaraṇaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā 🔽pe na uparāmāsam kusalam dhammam paṭicca na uparāmāsaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta 🔽ekam pe avigate eka
